name: PlayStation Sound Format File
summary: Learn about .PSF1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Nullsoft Winamp with the Highly Experimental plugin

content: NOTE: The same as .PSF2 files except they're created for PlayStation 1 games.

description: Audio file used for sequenced music in Sony PlayStation 1 emulated games; similar to .PSF (Portable Sound File) files but created for PlayStation games; contains samples, which are sounds (like a guitar), and sequences, which indicate how the sounds should be played.
